verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
A
All for love
You gave it all for love
Traded the stars above
You gave it all for love
All for love
You gave it all for love
With every drop of Your Blood
You gave it all for love

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
What would make You turn away from glory
Laying down Your Life to save the world
Giving up Your Throne
Giving up Your Throne
For a crown of thorns

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
King of all You became a Servant
Leaving ev'rything to rescue me
Never looking back
Never looking back
You embraced the cross

verse.name: e1
verse.lines:
Oh You gave it all for love
You gave it all for love
Traded the stars above
You gave it all for love
You gave it all for love
You gave it all for love
With ev'ry drop of Blood
You gave it all for love
With ev'ry drop of Blood
You gave it all for love
